program_name_suffix: Broward Health Medical Center Program
special_features_text: The Broward Health internal medicine residency provides an incredible training experience with a mixture of indigent and private patients in a large quaternary care center. You will see everything you've ever read about and many rare diseases you might not be familiar with. Our inpatient wards are complimented by terrific outpatient clinics and subspecialty rotations. Fort Lauderdale is a great place to live--perfect weather, cultural events, professional sports, and our world famous beaches.

program_name_suffix: East Tennessee State University/Quillen College of Medicine Program
special_features_text: Our program provides exposure to veterans, and rural & urban populations. We are a strong clinical program with all major fellowship options. We have a robust teaching curriculum that includes a weekly Academic Half Day, monthly Simulation Lab experiences, and both an inpatient and ambulatory curriculum in addition to the half-day. Our residents do get plenty of opportunities of teaching medical students. We provide subscription to U-world, Yale curriculum, and MKSAP.
program_director_organization: ETSU James H Quillen Coll of Med
contact_organization: ETSU James H Quillen Coll of Med

program_name_suffix: HCA HealthOne/Sky Ridge Medical Center Program
special_features_text: Situated just south of Denver, HealthOne Internal medicine provides a perfect opportunity to grow and learn while maintaining an active healthy lifestyle.

program_name_suffix: Jefferson Health New Jersey Program
special_features_text: Osteopathic Recognized! In house fellowship, Cardio, Pulm/Crit, GI, Nephro, ID and Endo.

program_name_suffix: Legacy Health/Emanuel Medical Center Program
special_features_text: We are located in 2 distinct downtown Portland hospitals, focused on offering diverse resident experiences, by caring for many traditionally underserved patients. Residents receive clinical experience rooted in academic medicine in a rigorous but supportive environment, from being the primary care physician of patients with health disparities to robust hands on inpatient and ICU experience, residents are well prepared for the future doing the right things for their patients, community, and world

program_name_suffix: Lehigh Valley Health Network Program
special_features_text: Lehigh Valley Health Network internal medicine residency offers a program focused on dedicated teaching, innovational implementation of the RRC requirements, great salary and benefits, and up-to-date and growing facilities in a beautiful environment with many fellowship and leadership opportunities. Free fitness membership and wellness dollars to use for a variety of classes and massage.

program_name_suffix: Montefiore St Luke's Cornwall Program
special_features_text: Visit our website for additional information about our program: https://www.montefioreslc.org/find-a-doctor/graduate-medical-education/internal-medicine-residency-program/

program_name_suffix: Mount Sinai Hospital Medical Center of Chicago Program
special_features_text: Mt. Sinai is a busy "safety net" teaching hospital located on the near west side of the city that serves a culturally diverse patient population. Our program includes 36 categorical & 3 preliminary residents. The majority of our graduates pursue careers as hospitalists. Those seeking fellowship training (about one third of a class) are successful and obtain fellowships in critical care, cardiology, palliative care, nephrology, rheumatology, and endocrinology.

program_name_suffix: Saint Joseph Hospital Program
special_features_text: Clinical experience at an award-winning 400-bed hospital; named as one of America's 100 Best Hospitals. One of Colorado's newest and most advanced facilities. Opportunities for elective rotations and research with National Jewish Health & the University of Colorado. Outstanding ultrasound and procedural training. All residents receive their own hand-held ultrasound machines. We serve a very large underserved population and provide the most charity care in the State of Colorado.

program_name_suffix: St Agnes HealthCare Program
special_features_text: An individualized approach to medical education in a tightly knit residency with emphasis on personal growth. Special features include research opportunities at University of Maryland, Hopkins and at St Agnes, opportunity for clinical away rotations, close mentorship, progressive supervised autonomy, quality improvement projects and exposure to outpatient practice environments in affiliated practices.

program_name_suffix: Trinity Health Oakland/Wayne State University Program
special_features_text: Team based patient centered approach. No in-house call but night shifts during some rotations (max. 40 night shifts/year in PGY1, 45 night shifts/year for PGY2, 40 night shifts/year for PGY3). ABIM preparatory course, web-based tests and recorded conferences for review and attendance. SIM lab, POCUS, procedure, FCCS, Rapid Response training. In-house IRB. Prioritizes wellness, flexible in scheduling. No 24-hour call. Separate in-patient management teams without call days and admissions teams.

program_name_suffix: UMass Chan-Baystate Program
special_features_text: Welcome to UMass Chan-Baystate, a place to call home. We prioritize clinical innovation, transformative medical education, and patient-centered care within our 746-bed state-of-the-art integrated academic health system. As Massachusetts' third-largest teaching hospital, our program supports personalized career goals and offers growth opportunities, preparing residents for competitive fellowships and career placements in their chosen fields. Explore our unique program; you will love what you see!

program_name_suffix: University of Kansas (Wichita) Program
special_features_text: Residents completing training in our program are prepared to handle any challenge they may face. Our rotations are designed to provide broad clinical exposure while offering flexibility in helping residents achieve their career goals. Whether they plan to enter rural primary care or stay in an urban area as a hospitalist, primary care physician or subspecialist; our residents are given opportunities to shape and mold their training experience to better prepare them for their future careers.
program_director_organization: University of Kansas School of Medicine-
contact_organization: Univ of Kansas Sch of Med-Wichita

program_name_suffix: University of Puerto Rico Program
special_features_text: Our program is one of the oldest in Puerto Rico. Our variety of clinical settings provides the perfect scenario for the resident's learning experience. We required candidates to be fluent in Spanish language  due to the population that we serve. Feel free to contact us if you have any questions.
program_director_organization: Univ of Puerto Rico Sch of Med
contact_organization: Univ of Puerto Rico Sch of Med

program_name_suffix: University of Vermont Medical Center Program
special_features_text: Our program is dedicated to providing outstanding education to meet the needs of our residents. We offer three tracks; categorical (12/year), primary care (3/year) and preliminary (2-3/year-limited to advanced programs). If you're interested in training in a high-functioning, team-oriented major academic institution located in the thriving and vibrant setting of Burlington Vermont, please review our website and contact us with any questions.

program_name_suffix: Virtua Program
special_features_text: Advanced Cardiovascular and Pulmonary Care - Diagnostic/Interventional cardiac catheterizations, - Coronary Artery Bypass Graft (CABG) - Transcatheter Aortic Valve Replacement - Thrombectomy (Pulmonary Embolism) - Extracorporeal Membrane Oxygenation (ECMO)

program_name_suffix: Yale-New Haven Medical Center (Primary Care) Program
special_features_text: The Yale primary care program seeks to train diverse leaders in general internal medicine and primary care. We have an outstanding core faculty dedicated to teaching and mentoring residents. We have outstanding curriculum and clinical experiences in ambulatory and inpatient medicine, community engagement and advocacy, evidence based medicine, global health and scholarship opportunities in a setting which teaches and models a truly biopsychosocial approach to patient care.

program_name_suffix: Zucker School of Medicine at Hofstra/Northwell at Mather Hospital Program
special_features_text: Work/life balance. 24/7 access to healthy snacks and meals. Wellness initiatives and events. Offsite electives available. Global health electives supported. Scholarly activity opportunities with conference stipend available if selected to present. Access to the American College of Physicians MKSAP curriculum and board review questions as well as UWorld Question Bank. Suburban setting conducive to family living.

program_name_suffix: Arrowhead Regional Medical Center Program
special_features_text: ARMC offers an ACGME accredited 3-year residency. We accept 16 residents per year. It is the intent of the training program to develop academic physicians well trained and able to practice in a competent and independent fashion. The program is dynamic and continues to evolve in order to provide residents with an outstanding educational experience, while maintaining the delivery of the highest quality of medical care to our patients and community.

program_name_suffix: Atlantic Health System/Overlook Medical Center Program
special_features_text: OMC IM aims to create a learning environment that encourages the development of future health care leaders. We are deeply committed to creating a safe environment that fosters diversified inquiry & innovation. Our program prioritizes resident well-being, recognizing that emotional wellness is linked to providing high quality and compassionate care.

program_name_suffix: Charleston Area Medical Center/CAMC Institute for Academic Medicine Program
special_features_text: Our internal medicine residency program is sponsored by CAMC, however, we collaborate with the West Virginia University Charleston Campus, an affiliate educational partner. This partnership offers a university atmosphere in the setting of a community hospital located in a safe and beautiful city! Please note that PGY1 residents receive $1,500 to support the costs associated with USMLE/COMLEX 3.

program_name_suffix: Danbury Hospital Program
special_features_text: Visit our website for additional information about our program: https://learning.nuvancehealth.org/residency-programs/internal-medicine-residency-program-at-danbury-hospital/

program_name_suffix: Geisinger Health System (Danville) Program
special_features_text: Discover Geisinger's IM Danville Residency, where innovation meets exceptional care. Experience a comprehensive curriculum, state-of-the-art facilities, and a collaborative environment. Our 594-bed academic center, the region's trauma hub, features 60+ ICU beds, 38 ORs, and extensive subspecialty services. With personalized mentorship and a family-friendly community, 60% of graduates stay at Geisinger, and 50% enter fellowship. Elevate your future with Geisinger!

program_name_suffix: Greater Baltimore Medical Center Program
special_features_text: The mission of the GBMC Internal Medicine Residency Program is to develop physician leaders who practice evidence-based medicine lifelong; who transform healthcare systems to become patient-centered, safe, and efficient; and who promote the health and wellness of the community. Our program mission statement directly incorporates the hospital mission statement: To every patient, every time, we will provide the care that we would want for our own loved ones.

program_name_suffix: Henry Ford Providence Hospital Program
special_features_text: The program received full accreditation for 10 years and has fully accredited fellowships in cardiology, interventional cardiology, hematology/oncology, GI, and pulmonary/critical care medicine.

program_name_suffix: MaineHealth Program
special_features_text: Training pathways for primary care, hospitalist, fellowship, geriatrics, rural medicine, clinician-educator, leadership, and research. 4+2 block scheduling. Academic half-day. Diverse patient population including urban, rural, VA, and refugees. Longitudinal curricula for simulation, QI, EBM, POCUS, and pop health. Academic opportunities of large 700 bed tertiary center, with mentorship of smaller residency program. Portland offers great small city on the ocean with easy access to the outdoors.

program_name_suffix: Meharry Medical College Program
special_features_text: Meharry Medical College is an HBCU. Meharry helps improve the health and health care of minority and underserved communities by offering excellent education and training programs in the health sciences and places special emphasis on providing opportunities for people of color, individuals from disadvantaged backgrounds and others regardless of race or ethnicity; delivering high quality health services; and conducting research that fosters the elimination of health disparities.
program_director_address_line2: 1005 Dr D B Todd Jr Blvd
contact_address_line2: 1005 Dr D B Todd Jr Blvd

program_name_suffix: Prisma Health/University of South Carolina School of Medicine Columbia (Columbia) Program
special_features_text: Leader in ultrasound education with potential for ultrasound certificate upon graduation. Simulation center for procedure instruction. Strong tradition of collegiality and teamwork. Focus on both personal and professional resident development, ample free choice electives to explore career options. Only level 1 trauma center/certified stroke center/advanced heart failure center for our region. Multiple in house fellowship options. Academic center with 100+ years in GME.

program_name_suffix: Saint Peter's University Hospital/Rutgers Robert Wood Johnson Medical School Program
Texas Tech University (Permian Basin) Program
special_features_text: Required on-site seminars include Teaching Residents to Teach in the fall and Teaching Residents to Lead in the spring. Our program also includes an endocrinology fellowship, and most others are available within the overall Texas Tech system. Critical care medicine education and training is particularly strong here. We have had excellent success in our residents' progressing to this fellowship and others of their choice.
program_director_organization: Texas Tech Univ HSC Permian Basin
contact_organization: Texas Tech Univ HSC Permian Basin

program_name_suffix: Texas Tech University HSC El Paso Program
special_features_text: Currently we have three ACGME-accredited fellowship programs in cardiology, gastroenterology and nephrology. Ambulatory clinic rotations occur on-site at our Patient Centered Medical Home, it is a large volume ambulatory care facility. UMC, El Paso County's 390-bed hospital is West Texas region's only Level 1 trauma center.
program_director_organization: Texas Tech Univ HSC Foster Sch of Med
contact_organization: Texas Tech Univ HSC El Paso

program_name_suffix: United Health Services Hospitals Program
special_features_text: The UHS Internal Medicine Residency offers extensive procedures training, customizable schedules based on interest, an accredited Osteopathic Recognition program, opportunities for scholarly activity, training in quality methodology, board preparation courses and educational material stipends.

program_name_suffix: Wellstar Health System/WellStar Kennestone Regional Medical Center Program
special_features_text: Our interview season will run from early October 2023 through mid-January 2024. Applications will only be accepted through the Electronic Residency Application Service (ERAS) and any interested individual must be registered to participate in the National Residency Match Program (NRMP); no program positions will be offered outside of the NRMP.

program_name_suffix: Abrazo Health Network Program
AdventHealth Florida (Orlando) Program
special_features_text: Very large and complex hospital (largest hospital in USA) with six transplantation programs, multiple ICU's, and a state of the art simulation center. Large pool of volunteer faculty in addition to the paid faculty. 98% ABIM pass rate since program inception. AdventHealth offers a Primary Care track. 60% of all graduates enter fellowship. AdventHealth also offers a critical care fellowship, cardiology fellowship, palliative care fellowship, and GI fellowship.

program_name_suffix: AdventHealth Redmond Program
special_features_text: Our goal is to educate residents to become exceptional Internists through innovative teaching methods and patient-focused care. Our faculty have appointments with the Medical College of Georgia and Philadelphia College of Osteopathic Medicine, and we are a teaching site for students from both schools. Our graduates are dedicated physicians, competent and self-assured in the full scope of their practice from the primary care clinic to the critical care unit.

program_name_suffix: Ascension St Vincent Hospital Indianapolis Program
special_features_text: We are a Level 1 trauma, tertiary care hospital with a large influx of local and referred patients providing great pathology! We have several tracks to customize your education including Primary Care, POCUS, Patient Safety / QI, Global Health, Women's Health, and the Clinician Educator Track. We provide comprehensive longitudinal training in POCUS, addiction medicine, healthcare disparities, and more. We have great fellowships in Cardiology (EP/Interv/HF), Pulm / Critical Care, and Geriatrics!

program_name_suffix: Bayhealth Medical Center Program
special_features_text: Bayhealth prioritizes relationship building between residents and faculty to create a collegial learning environment. 3+1 schedule promotes resident well-being and balances inpatient and ambulatory experience. Night float system - no 24-hour call. Noon conference and academic afternoon each week is protected educational time. Monthly administrative half day provides scheduling flexibility for personal needs. One-on-one coaching program to promote your personal growth and well-being.

program_name_suffix: Baylor University Medical Center Program
special_features_text: Program provides travel expenses to conferences for residents when presenting, reimburses for approved board study materials, and provides education stipend for senior residents. Available international rotation for senior residents. Monthly meal allowance.

program_name_suffix: Carle Foundation Hospital Program
special_features_text: The Carle Health, a truly integrated health care system affiliated with the Carle- Illinois College of Medicine, offers a community-based, university affiliated residency program in a micro-urban setting. We offer preliminary, primary care track and categorical tracks and an opportunity for residents to experience a vertically integrated academic healthcare system.  Graduates from US and international medical schools are welcome to apply (H1-b visas are not offered).

program_name_suffix: Corewell Health-Grand Rapids/Michigan State University Program
special_features_text: Butterworth Hospital is a Level I trauma center and clinical leader in cardiovascular, cancer, neurosciences, among many others. Spectrum Health provides high level services, including heart, lung, and bone marrow transplant, which adds exposure of complex specialized patient populations to truly enhance the educational experience. Spectrum Health has been awarded primary stroke center and heart failure certifications and has won the Beacon Award for Critical Care Excellence.
